transcript: ahmad from pakistan can you say that allah is beyond time and time does not exist for allah i don't understand can you say that allah is beyond that time allah is what beyond our time of course allah azzawajal is the creator of time so time does not bound allah does not abound allah azza subhanahu wa and this is why one of allah's beautiful names is the first and the last so he is the first without a beginning and he is the last without an end therefore time does not uh um restrict allah subhanahu ta'ala as it is one of his creation and allah knows best you
